room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by 321 Escape Rooms in Melbourne
room_address: 5270 N US HWY 1 Palm Shores, FL 32940
room_description:
Welcome to The Experiment.  You have been kidnapped by Dr. Vilius to take part in a study aimed at making the human race stronger and wiser.   In order to weed out inferior beings, you have been given a virus, some of your superior bodies will be able to fight the virus, thus making your stronger and a more desirable member of the human race. However, others of you will die within days of receiving the virus, weeding out the weaker humans.  You are to stay in his lab so that we are able to collect data on your reaction to the virus.  In one hour, Dr. Vilius will return for you and check on how you are doing.  Some he will send home, others will remain to take part in more in-depth experiments aimed at aiding the human race.
 
But not all is as it seemsâ€¦
